changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Remove specimen gel resource and its associated ACL
changeSet.sql: delete from rbac_role_access_list_ops where acl_id in ( select acl.identifier from rbac_role_access_list acl inner join rbac_resources r on r.identifier = acl.resource_id where r.name = 'SpecimenGel' )
delete from rbac_role_access_list where resource_id in ( select identifier from rbac_resources where name = 'SpecimenGel' )
